===Noun===

# A sugar-coated brownish-black tablet used in [[traditional Chinese medicine]] "to ''dissolve mass'', to activate blood circulation, to dispel ''heat'' and counteract toxicity in the treatment of mass in the breast, mastitis, and cystic hyperplasia of breast".
